channel.title: Bleeding Hearts Club (and the Eye of Providence)
channel.description: [img]http://cdn.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1207/BeFunky_2012-02-10_085559_1414495_1465504.jpg[/img] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Server Ip: bleedingheartsclub.org:25565 Website: http://www.bleedingheartsclub.org Teamspeak: voice.bleedingheartsclub.org ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ We have a dedicated server meaning more up time for you. Its survival, creative, and roleplay Its a towny server, You make money by gathering resources outside of towns where there is free build, and buy shop and house plots in towns, make enough and you can make your own town. We have the jobs plugin but there are no jobs you make money for doing all the jobs except builder and digger, and you do so without having to join any jobs. There is Gold and Silver, Gold is dollars, Silver is cents. You can buy plots, shop plots or your own town, but you must know towny to make your own town. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Ranks: Heretic - Punishment, cant do anything Believer - Default, can make towns, build in wild, make money by gathering resources Priest - Town Owner or Assistant, get by asking a mage aft your a Town Owner or assistant, Can ignore LWC Mason - Builder, after a priest, you must apply on the forums at http://www.bleedingheartsclub.org, priest with creative mode must be 10 Mage - Admin, after a mason must apply on the forums at http://www.bleedingheartsclub.org, Has most commands, must be 12 Oracle - Co-Owner, get by being a Mage, know how to run server, hand picked by darganking, must be 15 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Important Plugins: Towny LWC McMMO Iconomy Chest Shop mmSupernaturals Jobs - Modified, don't have to join a Job they are all available on start Essentials Spout NoLagg NoCheat Group Manager No Floating Trees ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Additional Details 24/7 Towny server, Make money by gathering resources outside of towns where there is free build, and buy shop and house plots in towns, make enough and you can make your own town.

item.title: Bleeding Hearts Club (and the Eye of Providence)
item.dc:creator: @darganking darganking
item.description:
@darganking wrote:

Server Ip: bleedingheartsclub.org:25565
Website: http://www.bleedingheartsclub.org
Teamspeak: voice.bleedingheartsclub.org

We have a dedicated server meaning more up time for you. Its survival, creative, and roleplay Its a towny server, You make money by gathering resources outside of towns where there is free build, and buy shop and house plots in towns, make enough and you can make your own town. We have the jobs plugin but there are no jobs you make money for doing all the jobs except builder and digger, and you do so without having to join any jobs. There is Gold and Silver, Gold is dollars, Silver is cents. You can buy plots, shop plots or your own town, but you must know towny to make your own town.

Ranks:
Heretic - Punishment, cant do anything
Believer - Default, can make towns, build in wild, make money by gathering resources
Priest - Town Owner or Assistant, get by asking a mage aft your a Town Owner or assistant, Can ignore LWC
Mason - Builder, after a priest, you must apply on the forums at http://www.bleedingheartsclub.org, priest with creative mode must be 10
Mage - Admin, after a mason must apply on the forums at http://www.bleedingheartsclub.org, Has most commands, must be 12
Oracle - Co-Owner, get by being a Mage, know how to run server, hand picked by darganking, must be 15

Important Plugins:
Towny
LWC
McMMO
Iconomy
Chest Shop
mmSupernaturals
Jobs - Modified, donâ€™t have to join a Job they are all available on start
Essentials
Spout
NoLagg
NoCheat
Group Manager
No Floating Trees

Additional Details
24/7 Towny server, Make money by gathering resources outside of towns where there is free build, and buy shop and house plots in towns, make enough and you can make your own town.
